text: Patrick Kilpatrick (born Robert Donald Kilpatrick Jr.; August 20, 1949), an American actor, director, screenwriter, producer, journalist, international entertainment speaker and teacher. He appeared in villain roles in The Replacement Killers (1998), Eraser (1996), Last Man Standing (1996), Minority Report (2002), Under Siege 2: Dark Territory (1995), The Presidio (1988), Last Stand at Saber River (1997) and Crossfire Trail (2001). Kilpatrick is running for Governor of California in the 2021 recall election as a Democrat. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American teachers Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Journalists from California Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Virginia Category:Writers from Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Los Angeles Category:Educators from Virginia
title: Patrick Kilpatrick
